comments.body: well this is going to cost us a lot in technical debt...
this seems like a flaw in the test_api package. How are we supposed to do this?
These APIs are stable but haven't been formally made public yet. I've opened https://github.com/dart-lang/test/issues/962 to track, but most of these could be moved to lib.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +16,20 @@import 'package:test_api/src/backend/message.dart'; // ignore: implementation_imports
import 'package:test_api/src/backend/invoker.dart';  // ignore: implementation_imports
import 'package:test_api/src/backend/state.dart'; // ignore: implementation_imports

import 'package:test_api/test_api.dart';
